data.short_description: Toast showing "Nickname Cleared." won't show when changing nickname on any server to a space and hit save, unlike when you change nickname just like this of any other user.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to server settings>members, click on any member having no nickname and in the change nickname text field, hit a space and click on save button. - Notice a toast showing "Nickname Cleared." shows up. - Change your nickname in any server doing the same, adding space and clicking on save.
